name: Identifying False Religious Authorities
description: Unmasking religious leaders and institutions that exploit faith for control rather than spiritual enlightenment.
focus: Identifying False Prophets and Cult Leaders

cards.title: Exposing Corrupt Religious Hierarchies
cards.description: Analyzing how religious institutions are structured to maintain control over followers.
bulletpoints: Understanding hierarchical structures and their roles in obedience enforcement.
Recognizing financial exploitation within religious organizations.
How fear-based doctrines are used to prevent critical thinking and dissent.

cards.title: Identifying False Prophets and Manipulative Leaders
cards.description: Spotting self-appointed spiritual leaders who manipulate faith for personal gain.
bulletpoints: Characteristics of false messiahs and self-proclaimed prophets.
How controlled opposition operates within religious groups.
The use of prophecy manipulation to maintain psychological dominance.

cards.title: Psychological Warfare within Religious Institutions
cards.description: Understanding how belief systems are weaponized for mind control.
bulletpoints: How guilt and sin are used as tools of obedience.
Recognizing the signs of religious trauma and spiritual abuse.
The use of social exclusion and excommunication to enforce control.
